mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.clinic_label AS "clinicLabel", a.day_of_week AS "dayOfWeek", a.time_desc AS "timeDesc", a.registration_limits AS "registrationLimits", a.appointment_limits AS "appointmentLimits", a.phone_limits AS "phoneLimits", a.web_limits AS "webLimits", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clinic_schedule( id, org_id, clinic_label, day_of_week, time_desc, registration_limits, appointment_limits, phone_limits, web_limits, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{clinicLabel}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{timeDesc}, #{registrationLimits}, #{appointmentLimits}, #{phoneLimits}, #{webLimits}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE clinic_schedule SET org_id = #{orgId}, clinic_label = #{clinicLabel}, day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek}, time_desc = #{timeDesc}, registration_limits = #{registrationLimits}, appointment_limits = #{appointmentLimits}, phone_limits = #{phoneLimits}, web_limits = #{webLimits}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
